skill.name: Decision-First Development Workflow
skill.description: This approach describes how to systematically capture architectural decisions throughout the development lifecycle, integrating decision rationale with artifacts to preserve "why" knowledge for fut...

principles.title: Decision Visibility
principles.description: Every architectural decision should be discoverable and traceable from ideation through implementation.

principles.title: Flow State Respect
principles.description: Decision capture timing should adapt to individual productivity rhythmsâ€”defer when deep in creation, collaborate when iterating with agents, formalize during reflection.

principles.title: Bidirectional Linking
principles.description: Decisions reference affected artifacts; artifacts reference governing decisions. No orphaned rationale.

principles.title: Progressive Fidelity
principles.description: Start with lightweight markers, evolve to synthesis documents, formalize as ADRs when patterns stabilize.

principles.title: Agent Awareness
principles.description: AI agents check relevant ADRs before proposing changes and include decision references in generated artifacts.

when_to_use: Making architectural choices that will affect multiple components
Establishing conventions or patterns for the codebase
Working with AI agents on complex features requiring context
Onboarding new contributors who need to understand rationale
when_not_to_use: Making trivial implementation details (e.g., variable naming)
Working on experimental prototypes not intended for production
Decision rationale is obvious from the code itself

workflow.name: Exploration (Ideation)
workflow.objective: Investigate problem space and evaluate options.

workflow.name: Synthesis (Integration)
workflow.objective: Integrate multiple exploration threads into coherent patterns.

workflow.name: Formalization (ADR)
workflow.objective: Document architectural decision with full rationale.

workflow.name: Implementation (Code/Docs)
workflow.objective: Apply decision in artifacts with clear traceability.
activities: Update directives if behavioral changes needed

troubleshooting.title: Decision Marker Overload
troubleshooting.symptoms: Too many markers, signal-to-noise ratio degrading.
causes: Marking implementation details instead of architectural decisions
Not promoting markers to ADRs when patterns stabilize

troubleshooting.title: Broken ADR References
troubleshooting.symptoms: Links to non-existent ADRs in decision markers.
causes: Marker references ADR not yet created

troubleshooting.title: Low Decision Debt but Poor Discoverability
troubleshooting.symptoms: All markers promoted to ADRs, but contributors still can't find rationale.
causes: Search keywords don't match actual decisions
